featured.text: According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Wetas are unpleasant to the eye.
19 a stye can look unpleasant at times, it is usually harmless and doesn’t cause vision problems.
For those with unpleasant experiences, trauma may be triggered by the themes and images in the movies, which could make their symptoms worse.

definition.zh_def: 令人不快的，讓人感到不舒服或不愉快的。
definition.example: The unpleasant smell in the room made everyone feel uneasy.
